name: TETRIS THE GRAND MASTER 3 -Terror Instinct-
summary: Tetris The Grand Master 3 Terror-Instinct, abbreviated TGM3 or Ti, is a Tetris game from Arika, part of the TGM series. It was released in 2005 after 5 years of the second game. The game now runs on PC-based hardware, specifically the Taito Type X. The level system has been expanded in many forms with increasingly stricter requirements to reach the Grand Master rank. Modes include Easy, Sakura (a puzzle mode), the traditional Master mode, and Shirase (an extension of T.A. Death with even harsher speed, garbage, and levels beyond 999). It also features World (added by Arika due to The Tetris Company's recent policy changes) and Classic (TGM Rotation/ARS) Rules.
